document.full_text: winning machine novak djokovic brushed aside juan martin del potro while andy murray overcame an ankle injury as they joined champion rafa nadal in the french open fourth round on saturday.
document.title: djokovic, nadal and murray battle through
lines_and_colors: winning machine novak djokovic brushed aside juan martin del potro while andy murray overcame an ankle injury as they joined champion rafa nadal in the french open fourth round on saturday.
